description: A deal with Blue Islands airline allows passengers to buy a single ticket for connecting flights.
title: Loganair and Blue Islands to offer Scotland and Channel Islands link
title_page: Loganair and Blue Islands to offer Scotland and Channel Islands link - BBC News
maintext: Loganair's chief executive Jonathan Hinkles said: "Providing dependable air services to communities throughout the UK, the Channel Islands and Isle of Man is a core part of the 'DNA' of both airlines, and by joining up our networks, we can help many more customers reach their destination."
